reviewText: It is well done and entertaining.

Rochelle Ballard and several others are also in this documentary, much of the surfing footage seems to focus on Melanie--and she's pretty cool, so it's not a bad thing. This is a fast moving and fun to watch dvd. Not spectacular, but definitely worth a look. Would be a good one to add to your girls-who-surf library, for sure.
SUCH A GOOD SURF FILM.  ADD IT TO YOUR COLLECTION.  THE TOP PRO SURFER GIRLS ARE SURFING BETTER THAN EVER.  MELANIE BARTELS IS REALLY FUNNY AND THE BEHIND THE SCENES ARE CLASSIC!
